function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete data on COVID-19 infections, recoveries, and deaths","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and conclusions, leading to ineffective policies","Mitigation":"Use multiple reliable data sources to cross-reference and validate COVID-19 data","Technologies":"Data validation tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate compliance with public health guidelines and regulations","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases, leading to higher infection rates and mortality","Mitigation":"Implement strict enforcement of public health guidelines, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, contact tracing apps","People":"Community members, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding and clarity around public health metrics and tools","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data and ineffective policy decisions","Mitigation":"Develop user-friendly visual tools for public understanding, provide clear and accessible public health guidance","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, communication platforms","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, communication agencies"}]}
